# providesPreciseDurationAndTiming

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the asset provides precise duration and timing.

## Declaration

```swift
var providesPreciseDurationAndTiming: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

This property value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if you initialized the asset with the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVURLAssetPreferPreciseDurationAndTimingKey] initialization option, otherwise it’s [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Accessing duration and timing

- **duration**: A time value that indicates the asset’s duration.
- **minimumTimeOffsetFromLive**: A time value that indicates how closely playback follows the latest live stream content.
